[account.company] - [account.contact]

(7 Day Trial Account, Maximum of 10 participants*)

Hi [account.contact],

Below are instructions for using your trial account. You can begin using the service immediately. Take control of your virtual meetings and presentations - no reservation required. Below are your permanent dial-in number, entry codes and Login URL, and attached are the User's Guides. If you have any questions, or would like a guided demo, please call 1.888.203.7900.

Phone Conferencing

Dial-in numbers and entry codes
•
Dial-in Number: [dialinNo.tollfreeno] or [dialinNo.tollno] for international callers
•
Chairperson Entry Code: [account.cec](#) for you
•
Participant Entry Code: [account.pec](#) for everyone else

To begin a phone conference
1.
Invite your Participants. Give them the date/time of the conference, the Dial-in Number, and Participant Entry Code.
2.
At the designated date/time, enter the Dial-in Number from any telephone. At the prompt, key in your Chairperson Entry Code. Participants join in exactly the same fashion, only they use the Participant Entry Code.

Chairperson commands
This is a partial list only. See the Users Guide at www.infiniteconferencing.com/userguides for a complete list.
 
*0
Summon an operator
*5
Mute/Unmute everyone but yourself
*6
Mute/Unmute your own line (Participants can use this command also)
*7
Lock/Unlock the conference entrance
 
Additional commands
The following commands for dial-out capability are additionally available upon request (turned off for trial accounts by default).
   
*1
Enter dial-out mode. At dial tone, dial 1 + area code + phone number
*2
Return yourself and dialed-out party to conference
*3
Abort dial-out and return yourself to conference
 

Web Conferencing

Login information
•
 Login URL:   www.infiniteconferencing.com/join for both you and Participants
•
 Chairperson Code: [account.cec] for you
•
 Participant Code: [account.pec] for everyone else
 
To begin a web conference
•
 Invite your Participants. Give them the date/time of your meeting, Participant Code and Login URL. At the designated date/time, go to the Login URL.
•
 Under Host Conference enter your Chairperson Code, Participant Code, and Name. Click the [Log In] button and you will enter the WebInterpoint console. You must now start the session by clicking on the [Start] button before Participants can log in.
•
 Participants should go to the same Login URL. Under Join Conference they should type the Participant Code and their name, and click the [Log In] button. You will see their name appear in the Attendee list. You now control what they are seeing.
•
 Please see the WebInterpoint QuickStart guide (pdf file) attached for more detailed usage instructions.
 

Additional Information

Notes
*
For the trial offer Reservationless phone & web conferencing will support up to 10 connections. Our normal default setting is 100 connections for both services (can be expanded if desired). If you have any questions or would like a demonstration please call our Sales Department at 1.888.203.7900.
***
These features are only available with a paid-account.
